devdoc.details: Contract destination for aquiring and selling UCs.

addCollateral(address,uint256).details: Deposit collateral for placing purchase orders. The equivalent amount of USD is credited for placing the orders at a later time.

params._amount: amount of collateral Token to exchange

burn(uint256,address).details: Exchange UCs for collateral, burMake new tokens in exchangefor collateral and assign to sender This function has a non-reentrancy guard, so it shouldn't be called by another `nonReentrant` function.

params._amount: amount of UC okens to burn

burn(uint256,address).return: The amount of Collateral seller received

burnUCG(uint256,address).details: Exchange UCGs for collateral, burMake new tokens in exchangefor collateral and assign to sender This function has a non-reentrancy guard, so it shouldn't be called by another `nonReentrant` function.

params._amount: amount of UCG Tokens to burn

burnUCG(uint256,address).return: The amount of Collateral seller received

getReservesBalance().details: Get Total reserves balance (amount * price) for every collateral
getReservesBalance().return: The total reserves value in USD (6 decimals)

mint(address,uint256,uint256).details: Make new tokens in exchangefor collateral and assign to sender This function has a non-reentrancy guard, so it shouldn't be called by another `nonReentrant` function.

params._amount: amount of collateral Token to exchange
params._minUCAmount: minimum amount of UCs desired in exchange for the collateral

mint(address,uint256,uint256).return: The amount of UCs buyer received

ucgBurnValue(uint256,uint256).details: Returns UCG burn value for a certain amount of UCG token

params.colPrice: price of the collateral its being valued for (6 digit)
params.ucgQty: amount of UCG Tokens to burn (18 digit)

ucgBurnValue(uint256,uint256).return: UCG burn value in Collateral amount (Qty 18 digts)

devdoc.title: UCMarketplace

cancelSaleOrder(bytes32).notice: / instead of update, must remove and place another one.
